title: Can I become a famous singer? Do I need to be beautiful? - Quora

response.answer_text: You don't need to look a certain way to become a famous singer. You may think that some singers look wayyyyy better than you, but after all, does that really matter? What really matters is the talent they’ve got. If you can sing, you can become a singer and that's all. If your songs got meaning, if your songs sound good then you can become famous. You don't even have to show your face often to begin with. What matters is your voice, not your looks, and don't let anyone change that.
Anyone with a beautiful voice can be a famous singer, with the right motivation, repertoire, manager, and contacts. Luck helps, too.
